method.name: CopyFile

documentation.summary: Copies a file to the destination folder
documentation.param: File reference to the source file
Folder reference to the destination folder
Overwrite destination if a file with the same name already exists
documentation.returns: The response object with the result of the action

method.name: CreateFolder
method.declaration: FolderViewModel CreateFolder(string folderName, int folderParentID, int folderMappingID, string mappedPath);

documentation.param: folderName is the name of the new folder
The reference to the parent folder where the new folder will be create
folderMappingID is the mapping related with the new folder
mappedPath used for the mapping to folder in remove provider
documentation.returns: The newly folder created under the specified parent folder

documentation.summary: Deletes a collection of items (folder and/or files)
documentation.remarks: all the items belong at the same Folder
documentation.returns: The non deleted item list. The files / subfolders for which the user has no permissions to delete

documentation.summary: Gets the current Portal Id. This id depends on the configuration of the module
documentation.returns: The id of the current portal

documentation.summary: Get the list of the default FolderMappings, i.e.: Standard/Database/Secure, associated to the module instance. This depends on the configuration of the module.
documentation.returns: The list of default FolderMappingInfo associated

documentation.summary: Get the default FolderTypeId to use when creating new folders under the root folder. This depends on the module configuration
documentation.returns: The default FolderTypeId

documentation.summary: Gets a file entity by providing a file identifier.
documentation.returns: The fileItem entity.

method.name: GetFileContent
method.declaration: Stream GetFileContent(int fileId, out string fileName, out string contentType);

documentation.summary: Get the content of a file, ready to download
documentation.param: File reference to the source file
Returns the name of the file
Returns the content type of the file
documentation.returns: The file content

documentation.summary: Returns a fields set. These fields define the File preview info
documentation.returns: The Preview info object

documentation.summary: Gets a folder entity by providing a folder identifier.
documentation.returns: The folderItem entity or null if the folder cannot be located.

method.name: GetFolderContent
method.declaration: PageViewModel GetFolderContent(int moduleId, int folderId, int startIndex, int numItems, string sortExpression);

documentation.summary: Gets the files and folders contained in the specified folder.
documentation.param: The sort expression in a SQL format, e.g. FileName ASC
documentation.returns: The list of files and folders contained in the specified folder paginated

documentation.summary: Gets the list of the Folder Mappings. This list depends on the configuration of the module instanced
documentation.returns: The list of Folder Mappings

documentation.summary: Returns a fields set. These fields define the Folder preview info
documentation.returns: The Preview info object

documentation.summary: Gets the list of subfolders for the specified folder.
documentation.param: The folderItemId of the folder to get the list of subfolders.
documentation.returns: The list of subfolders for the specified folder.
The group folderItem entity.

documentation.summary: Get the index of the inital tab to be shown when module is loaded
documentation.returns: The index to the tab to be shown

documentation.summary: Returns all invalid chars for folder and file names
documentation.returns: A string that includes all invalid chars

documentation.summary: Returns the error text when a name contains an invalid character
documentation.returns: The error text to show when a name contains an invalid character

documentation.summary: Gets the root folder of the current Portal. This folder depends on the configuration of the module.
documentation.returns: The root folderItem entity.

documentation.summary: Get the URL of a file
documentation.param: File reference to the source file
documentation.returns: The URL of the file
The user folderItem entity.

documentation.summary: Check if the current user has the specified permission over the specified folder
documentation.returns: Returns TRUE if the current user has the specified permission over the specified folder. FALSE otherwise

method.name: MoveFile
method.declaration: CopyMoveItemViewModel MoveFile(int fileId, int destinationFolderId, bool overwrite);

documentation.summary: Moves a file to the destination folder
documentation.param: File reference to the source file
Folder reference to the destination folder
Overwrite destination if a file with the same name already exists
documentation.returns: The response object with the result of the action

method.name: MoveFolder
method.declaration: CopyMoveItemViewModel MoveFolder(int folderId, int destinationFolderId, bool overwrite);

documentation.summary: Moves a Folder to the destination folder
documentation.param: Folder reference to the source file
Folder reference to the destination folder
Overwrite destination if a file with the same name already exists
documentation.returns: The response object with the result of the action

documentation.param: The new name to set to the file
documentation.returns: The final renamed file

documentation.param: The new name to set to the folder
documentation.returns: The final moved folder

documentation.summary: Searches the files and folders contained in the specified folder.
documentation.param: The sort expression in a SQL format, e.g. FileName ASC
documentation.returns: The list of files and folders contained in the specified folder paginated

documentation.summary: Synchronize a folder within the File System
documentation.param: Reference to the folder is going to be synchronized
Indicates if subfolders are going to be synchronized

documentation.summary: Extracts the files and folders contained in the specified zip file to the specified folder.
documentation.param: File reference to the source file
Overwrite destination if a file with the same name already exists
documentation.returns: The response object with the result of the action
